job description:
QC Data Analyst – Largo, FL

Kelly Scientific is seeking a QA Data Analyst for a supplement manufacturer in the Largo, FL area. This is a direct hire opportunity. Monday-Friday on the 1st shift.

The ideal candidate will have strong experience with SAP software and experience with raw material tracking in a pharmaceutical setting.

GENERAL PURPOSE

To assist the QC team day to day activities in the testing and data processes within SAP systems.
POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Manage QC request and maintain and/or develop tracking matrices
  • Manage and maintain databases to communicate specific QC process(i.e. sample process, testing status, lot status and overall batch release process)
  • Participate SAP program -
    • Data collection
    • Database maintenance
    • Analysis
    • Protocols
  • Quality Assurance – Reviewer on key documentation and contributor to Quality systems. Ensuring quality and correctness through-out the processes below.
    • Lot Status
    • Raw Material CofA approval
    • Raw Material Tracking through SAP
    • Raw Material Profile
    • SOPs
    • Change Controls
  • Participate in Continuous Improvement initiatives
  • Provide Operations support on processing specifications, working together on solutions to production challenges.
  • Assist in the productivity of QC processes
    • Complete all internal departmental documentation accurately.
    • Reviewing documentation
  • Computer skills are a must; Microsoft Office Suite knowledge; Batch Master implementation
  • Perform other duties as required.
  • Willing to work overtime, holidays and weekends as requested by supervisor.

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS

Education:

Bachelor’s Degree in Chemistry, Biology or related field.

Experience:

Some experience with SAP in a related, regulated industry (Food, Nutritional, Drug, Cosmetic, or Medical Device).

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:
  • Self-starter and capable of managing own activities
  • Work independently as well as in team environments
  • Problem solving
  • Ability to operate computer software, e.g. Word, Excel, Outlook.- advanced Excel capabilities
  • Must have a good interpersonal and communication skill in English, understand both oral and written instructions and be detail oriented.
  • Excellent attention to detail

Certification or License:

None
